# Cornerstone AI - FSP Operations Accelerator

Cornerstone AI specializes in automating operations for Financial Service Providers (FSPs) in South Africa, focusing on Acquisition, Service & Retention, and Visibility. 
We provide an AI-driven infrastructure that helps insurance brokerages with 10-50 advisors scale efficiently without adding administrative bloat.
Our solution transforms manual workflows into automated systems, enabling FSPs to break through revenue ceilings and maximize enterprise value.
